title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 55.5 - Vehicular use
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 55.5 - Vehicular use

State Regulations
(a) No person shall
drive or park a motor vehicle in the area other than on roads and tank trails
designated by military authorities. (b) No person shall park a motor vehicle in
the area in such a manner as to prevent other vehicles from passing
safely. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
55.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
